Jung's Creativity Kit

You want to know more about me? Hover on each item and
My Creativity Kit will tell you more about me!

A BLESSED BRAIN:

Thanks to my genius brain,
I am able to design things till I die!

A TECH NERD SET:

Exploring new tech software
and hardware is my jam.

A CHICAGOAN
JAZZ LISTENER:

Jazz music always refreshes
and inspires me whenever
I feel stuck and lost.

A SECRET:

Coffee is my secret agent
that allows me to work for
more than 16 hours a day.

I've had experience with many facets in design, including UI/UX, graphic and 2, 3D Motion design. Based on these experiences, I am currently a UIUX designer at Wix.com Playground in NYC.


My goal as a UIUX designer is to create a bridge between a product and its users. I design this bridge that has experiences and stories people can empathize and interact with.


I am currently open for designer positions. So if you are interested,


Contact Me!

Junghoe Hwang
